attributes.description: This dashboard shows Investigation logs collected by the Extrahop integration.

params.markdown:
**Navigation**

#### ExtraHop

- [Detection](#/dashboard/extrahop-0987a5a3-15cb-4579-b298-08d170e7cb01)
- **Investigation**

#### Overview
This dashboard provides a summary of investigation data from the ExtraHop integration, enabling security teams to track incident trends, total investigations, top assignees, and common investigation types.

Visualizations highlight distributions by status and assessment, time-based investigation activity, and key investigation details, supporting faster analysis and effective incident response.

**[Integration Page](/app/integrations/detail/extrahop/overview)**

attributes.title: [Logs ExtraHop] Investigation
